document.full_text: kristoffer diaz's play "the elaborate entrance of chad deity," a comic drama about televised professional wrestling and identity politics, won the obie award for best new american play.
document.title: 'chad deity' takes obie for best new american play
lines_and_colors: kristoffer diaz's play "the elaborate entrance of chad deity," a comic drama about televised professional wrestling and identity politics, won the obie award for best new american play.
